articles.description: Live coverage as Pool B leaders Ireland face defending champions South Africa at the Stade de France.
articles.title: Rugby World Cup: South Africa v Ireland - build-up

articles.description: Watch BBC Final Score and follow text updates from three Premier League games, with Manchester City among those in action.
articles.title: Premier League: Build-up to three games, including Man City v Nottm Forest

articles.description: Watch BBC Two live on BBC iPlayer.
articles.title: Watch: England v Ireland - second ODI highlights. VideoWatch: England v Ireland - second ODI highlights

articles.description: Watch and follow live text updates as Fabian Edwards aims to dethrone middleweight champion Johnny Eblen at Bellator 299 in Dublin.
articles.title: Bellator Dublin: Edwards faces Eblen for middleweight title

articles.description: Wing Henry Arundell scores five tries as England slice apart Pool D's weakest opposition to all but qualify for the Rugby World Cup quarter-finals.
articles.title: Arundell scores five tries as England thrash Chile

articles.description: Leaders Manchester City hang on to beat Nottingham Forest despite Rodri's red card and maintain their perfect start to the Premier League season.
articles.title: Ten-man Man City beat Forest despite Rodri red card

articles.description: England opener Will Jacks makes 94 as the hosts beat Ireland by 48 runs in the second ODI at Trent Bridge to go 1-0 up in the three-match series.
articles.title: Jacks' 94 helps England to victory over Ireland

articles.description: The United States will take a 7-5 lead over Europe into Saturday's afternoon session after an enthralling morning in the Solheim Cup at Finca Cortesin.
articles.title: US retain two-point lead over Europe at Solheim Cup

articles.description: An experimental England side eventually defeat Ireland in the second one-day international at Trent Bridge.
articles.title: Experimental England defeat Ireland in second ODI

articles.description: Dominic Calvert-Lewin helps Everton end their winless Premier League start in a thoroughly deserved victory over Brentford.
articles.title: Calvert-Lewin helps Everton end winless start
